docs.title: Finance Pilots Graduate to Production
docs.snippet: Select AI pilots moved to production after passing evaluation gates; teams prioritize monitoring and incident response upgrades.

docs.title: EU Transparency Metrics Draft
docs.snippet: Draft guidance lists minimum transparency metrics and requires quarterly fairness assessments for high-impact systems.

docs.title: GPU Capacity Adds Headroom
docs.snippet: Expanded GPU availability lowers queue times and improves reliability for multimodal agent deployments in peak hours.

docs.title: Healthcare Triage Oversight
docs.snippet: Clinics add human oversight layers and escalation workflows to reduce risk from automated triage decisions.

docs.title: Retail Agent Experiments Continue
docs.snippet: Retailers keep iterating on agent prompts and guardrails to improve localization quality without sacrificing brand tone.

docs.title: EU Registry Proposal Gains Support
docs.snippet: Several member states back a registry for high-impact AI to accelerate supervisory reviews and incident remediation tracking.
